title: Career | AIMA Developpement

text.1: AD (AIMA Developpement) brings cyclotron conceptual designs into new territories providing leading-edge innovative cyclotron research. The AD Injection Systems Test (IST) is also a leading experimental research facility for testing various Ion sources and injection systems for cyclotrons.
text.2: Our research groups is expanding and recruiting physicists and engineers. In our team we therefore have the following positions available :

jobs.noJobs: No job offers are currently available.

visit: For more information see our website and send your application, please
